articles.title: Solar Orbiter gets world-first views of the Sun’s poles - European Space Agency
articles.description: Thanks to its newly tilted orbit around the Sun, the European Space Agency-led Solar Orbiter spacecraft is the first to image the Sun’s poles from outside the ecliptic plane. Solar Orbiter’s unique viewing angle will change our understanding of the Sun’s…
